title: Understanding Reality in Uncertain Times with Fanny Anzai
description: I have the chance to speak with fellow YouTuber Fanny Anzai on the way she makes sense of our current times. She shares her thoughts on the best way to unite us, which is to see that there is one reality shared by all of us. This brings us to discuss her journey from Catholicism to Atheism.
